sentence: I attended an onsite conference there in January 2015
Location was great for meeting in the Perimeter area Everything but the carpets
In town for an Eloqua Conference
Excellent venue for the event I was attending
Harold gave us great advise on restaurants to eat at concerts and events to attend and even invited us to have a kick drink at the bar in the hotel
The staff was great from my first meeting with JaiLita Joy Ezel
I attended a company function at this location and the service and food provided was exceptional
Rare combination of comfort and function
I stayed here because the conference I was attending was here
We were looking for a venue for an event on a tight budget and this hotel filled the bill nicely
We stayed for one night while in town for a work conference at the nearby Roam Perimeter Center
We were able to use the on demand shuttle to dinner at the Perimeter Mall when we arrived and I took that to the conference the next morning
They moved me after I complained about family gathering in the hallway constantly
There was no water provided in my event space
I spent three days at this hotel AND hosted an event here and not one person made an effort to say hello or ask me about my stay
Hot tub not functioning
The jacuzi did n’t function properly had a lot of dirt particles

Room was clean to start but did not appear to get vacuumed or thoroughly cleaned throughout the week thermostat was broken they did send someone to repair it but it still did not function correctly after that the premade eggs at breakfast looked like they had been sitting there for a week but there are made to order eggs available as well
We are in town to shoot video a conference and needed to get a monitor
We normally do research on hotels unfortunately the one time we took a chance to book the hilton garden Inn for conference without researching and we got hit
